CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Occurrence_Type__c, "OC"), "On-Call", "E" & TEXT(Frequency_Interval__c) & TEXT(Schedule_Frequency__c) & IF(ISPICKVAL(Schedule_Frequency__c, "W"), "(" & ( IF(INCLUDES(Service_Days__c, "S1"), "Su", "") & IF(INCLUDES(Service_Days__c, "M"), "M", "") & IF(INCLUDES(Service_Days__c, "T"), "T", "") & IF(INCLUDES(Service_Days__c, "W"), "W", "") & IF(INCLUDES(Service_Days__c, "T1"), "R", "") & IF(INCLUDES(Service_Days__c, "F"), "F", "") & IF(INCLUDES(Service_Days__c, "S"), "Sa", "") & ")" )& " - " & TEXT(Final_Frequency__c) & "x", ""))
CustomField.label: Service Schedule
